routes.Alaskan: From Seattle, Washington -> Anchorage, Alaska -> North Korea -> Fiji, Japan -> Seattle, Washington. Costs: $400 per person.
routes.Mediterraian: From Ellis Island, New York -> Syria -> Sicily, Italy -> Pisa, Italy -> Barcelona, Spain -> Dubai, United Arab Emirates -> Ellis Island, New York. Costs: $250 per person.
routes.Hawaiian: From Los Angeles, California -> Owaho, Hawaii -> Papua New Ginuea -> Indonesia -> Thailand -> Los Angeles, California. Costs: $400 per adult, $300 per child. Life Insurance proof requiered.
